oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.importExport.model.content
Class ImportExportProcessHelper

java.lang.Object
  oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.importExport.model.content.ImportExportProcessHelper

public class ImportExportProcessHelper
extends java.lang.Object

A library of static methods that can be used to perform actions to simplify the development of Import and Export File processes.

Methods interacting with the Content Repository rely on the underlying default connection. WCC (WebCenter Content) connections use the primary connection which, out of the box, has been defined to propagate the identity of the logged in user.

upload

public static Document upload(java.lang.String originalFileName,
                              java.lang.String format,
                              java.lang.String title,
                              java.lang.String contentRepositoryAccount,
                              java.io.InputStream input)
Upload content and associated descriptive data to the Content Repository.

Parameters:
originalFileName - the original name of the file.
format - the type of the content. For example, plain/text.
title - document name.
contentRepositoryAccount - category used to distinguish different groups of documents.
input - content of the file.
Returns:
a simple object representing the document as it is exists on the Content Repository.

Parameters:

format - the type of the content. For example, plain/text.
title - document name.
contentRepositoryAccount - category used to distinguish different groups of documents.
input - content of the file.
size - length of the stream in bytes.
Returns:
a simple object representing the document as it is exists on the Content Repository.

directory - location of the file

retrieveUnprocessed

public static java.util.List<Document> retrieveUnprocessed(java.lang.String contentRepositoryAccount)
Returns a list of documents for the given account from the Content Repository that have not been processed. The list is empty if no account is supplied. A document is processed when it has been assigned an ESS Request Id.

Parameters:
contentRepositoryAccount - category used to distinguish different groups of documents.
Returns:
list of documents.

markProcessed

public static void markProcessed(java.lang.Long id,
                                 java.lang.Long essRequestId)
Marks the document with the given id as processed.

Parameters:
id - uniquely identifies a document in the Content Repository.
essRequestId - uniquely identifies an ESS (Enterprise Scheduling System) job.

download

public static java.io.InputStream download(java.lang.Long id)
Returns the input stream from the Content Repository for the given id.

Parameters:
id - uniquely identifies a document in the Content Repository.
Returns:
downloaded from the Content Repository.

downloadFile

public static java.io.File downloadFile(java.lang.Long id,
                                        java.lang.String directory,
                                        java.lang.String fileName)
                                 throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                        java.io.IOException
Download a file retrieved from the Content Repository using the given id to the specified directory. If the file already exists, it will attempt to replace it.

Parameters:
id - uniquely identifies a document in the Content Repository.
directory - location where the file is to be placed.
fileName - name of the new file. If a file name is not specified then use the original name for the document.
Returns:
downloaded from the Content Repository.
Throws:
java.io.FileNotFoundException
java.io.IOException

downloadAndUnzipFile

public static void downloadAndUnzipFile(java.lang.Long id,
                                        java.lang.String directory)
                                 throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                        java.io.IOException
Downloads the unzipped files retrieved from the Content Repository to the specified directory. If a file already exists, it will attempt to replace it. The zip file itself is not downloaded.

Parameters:
id - uniquely identifies a document in the Content Repository.
directory - location where the files are to be placed.
Throws:
java.io.FileNotFoundException
java.io.IOException

public static java.util.List<Account> getAccounts()
Returns a list of available accounts for the logged in user.

Returns:
list of accounts
